name: Missile Defuser
description:
Genre: Console based guessing game.
Jam: Pure Text Jam

Synopsis

The year is 2182 and the people of Earth are in the midst of a battle against 'The AI Robots'. A lethal AI Missile has just landed and everyone is depending on you to find the secret code which unlocks its defuse mechanism. If you fail, the entire Earth Command Headquarters will be blown up.

Your computer is able to read the feedback circuitry to help narrow it down. After each try your computer will tell you if the code is EARLIER or LATER in the alphabet than your guess.

You have 4 chances to find the correct letter before the missile blows up!

Type the correct code letter (a-z) to defuse the missile.

Future / Donations

Any donations for this game will inspire me to continue development...

$2 Goal - Updated Console UI

  • Prettier console UI
  • Easy difficulty: includes a graph showing codes, and what has been tried - great for kids learning the alphabet!
  • Moderate difficulty: limited graph showing only codes used
  • Ability to change number of attempts (effectively changes the difficulty)

$5 Goal - Run In The Browser

  • Adds everything from the $2 goal!
  • Runs in the browser

$10 Goal - Run As Graphical Desktop App

  • Everything from the $2 goal!
  • Everything from the $5 goal!
  • Runs as a desktop app!
  • Includes graphics and animations
  • Include soundtrack and SFX
